title: Battery Start-up Log9 Partners With Jitendra New EV Tech For InstaCharging Battery Technology For E-Scooters - carandbike
content: Battery Start-up Log9 Partners With Jitendra New EV Tech For InstaCharging Battery Technology For E-Scooters  carandbike
description: Under the MOU, Log9 and Jitendra New will jointly roll out an e-scooter named 'JMT 1000HS Rapid', which will use the former's InstaCharge technology. The JMT 1000 HS e-scooters will be manufactured by Jitendra New EV Tech, while InstaCharged will be powered by Log9's RapidX batteries.
